0.9.name: wordpress/wp-meta-sort-posts
0.9.description: I initially developed WP Meta Sort Posts plugin because I needed to be able to create archive-style pages for posts based on custom fields. I quickly realized that it would be just as easy to knock down all the walls and allow for custom sorted pages to be created based on any combination of WordPress query variables. WP Meta Sort Posts is still in its initial beta release and I welcome all feedback and feature suggestions.
